reasoning: Extremely rare X-linked genodermatosis caused by mutations in MBTPS2 gene on chromosome Xp22. No population-based incidence or prevalence data available. Literature review over 50 years identified only ~43 published cases globally, indicating prevalence much less than 0.1 per 100k. Characterized by keratosis pilaris, progressive scarring alopecia, and other findings with predominance in affected males.
